parameters.name: AppUid
parameters.description:
The ID of the user.

The ID can be up to 32 characters in length. The ID can contain letters, digits, and hyphens (-).

parameters.name: Priority
parameters.description:
The priority of the message. Valid values:

*   **1**
*   **2**
*   **3**: This is the default value.

parameters.name: RoomId
parameters.description:
The ID of the room.

The ID can be up to 16 characters in length. The ID can contain letters, digits, and hyphens (-).
